comments.body: Instead of using a `"paths"` mapping, you could move the contents of `cookies.d.ts` and `url-search-params.d.ts` into `index.d.ts` as ambient modules, similar to how NodeJS handles its module definitions. I've added more specifics about this in the relevant files.
That's much better than messing with paths. Thanks for the tip!

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +39,43 @@namespace. 

## Using Built-In Modules

Bindings are available for the built-in `cookies` and `url-search-params`
